interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 20pcs Nail Tips Clips for Quick Building Polygel Nail Forms Nail Tips Clip for Finger Nail Extension DIY Manicure Nail Art Tool
Review Date: 2020/11/19
Store: tiggell
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Size': '20 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'Tiggell', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 6.85 x 2.2 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '795853588163'}
Review Text: Did their job! Fit the finger well, did not pinch and weren't overly tight. Had just enough squeeze to it to hold the form on so instead of doing one at a time you can do multiple. Had no issues curing through the clip. I also used it to pinch the end of an acrylic nail as well and it worked nicely for the as well.
Review Title: Doesnt hinder curing
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Natural Waterproof Mascara Extra Long Lash,Thick Thickening and Lengthening, No Clumping, No Smudging, Lasting Voluminous Eyelashes Dramatic Extension Mascara
SIKEMAY
{'Color': 'Black', 'Special Feature': 'Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, Hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676852', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'}
I really wanted to like this. Unlike most fiber mascaras this didnt give me much volume or length. And it flaked off after a full day of wear. I really love the packaging. I think this may be ok on fake lashes but not so great on real or short lashes.
Not a true fiber mascara.
Poly Nail Gel Kit, 7 Colors Nail Extension Gel with UV Lamp, Poly Extension Decoration Kit, Base Top Coat Set with Rhinestone, Nail Molds, Nail Art Gel Kits for Home DIY Manicure, Blue Nude Series
AIFAIFA
{'Color': 'Blue', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inches; 1.48 Pounds'}
I like that it comes in a case. The colors are vibrant. No strong smell. Only thing that disappointed me was the light. I had to do one finger at a time, flip it twice under it's own time in order to get fully dry. The light did not extend to all my fingers without some odd maneuvering.
Nice except the light.
Mini Rubber Bands Soft Elastic Bands for Kids Hair Non-slip Rubber Hair Bands Soft Hair Elastics Ties Bands Braids Hair for Girls - STRONG - REUSEABLE (Colorful1000+Black1000)
OLEWELL
{'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'OLEWELL', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 5 x 1 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SML'}
Have quite a bit of stretch. They didnt slip down the hair and they seem pretty strong. Love the multicolored ones, they were great to add color to different styles.
Bigger than most but work great

tiggell

Did their job! Fit the finger well, did not pinch and weren't overly tight. Had just enough squeeze to it to hold the form on so instead of doing one at a time you can do multiple. Had no issues curing through the clip. I also used it to pinch the end of an acrylic nail as well and it worked nicely for the as well.
Doesnt hinder curing
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to show a strong interest in cosmetics, particularly mascara, and has expanded their interests to include nail products and hair accessories. They favor features like volume, length, durability in mascara, vibrant colors and practical packaging in nail products, and functionality and strength in hair elastics. Their recent purchase indicates an interest in tools that enhance the nail application process, suggesting an evolving focus on DIY manicure solutions.

- **Quality Expectations:** This individual maintains high standards for performance across all beauty and grooming products, emphasizing effective results. They are drawn to items that deliver on their promises and express disappointment when products do not meet expectations.

- **Packaging Appreciation:** The user appreciates attractive and practical packaging, influencing their purchasing decisions, and enjoys adding visual appeal to their style through multifunctional accessories.

- **Critical Insight:** With prior experience in mascara and nail products, they provide constructive feedback based on personal experiences. They express critical views when necessary, demonstrating their commitment to quality. Their recent review reflects satisfaction with product performance and practicality, signifying a preference for efficient and effective tools in their beauty regimen.

- **Hair Accessory Insights:** Satisfied with the stretch and non-slip quality of hair elastics, they favor products that perform well and add an aesthetic element, such as colorful options for styling.

Overall, this user prioritizes effective and reliable beauty and grooming products, values quality and aesthetics, and is inclined to give detailed feedback based on their experiences.
